sentences.sContent: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.sCn: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.sContent: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.sCn: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

remMethod.val: dis(不) ＋ close(关闭) → 不关闭 → 揭示； 透露

words.tran: [审计] 披露；揭发；被揭发出来的事情

trans.tranOther: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret
